description: The agent is provided with a codebase (via git repository) and an issue description. It must modify multiple files to resolve the issue. The output must be a JSON object containing: { "patch": "the git diff content that fixes the issue", "modified_files": ["list of modified file paths"] }.

input.problem_statement: [issue title and detailed description, or content of the issue body]

expected_output.patch: [the git diff content that fixes the issue]
modified_files: [list of file paths that should be modified, e.g., src/sqlfluff/rules/L042.py]

environment_setup.install_command: [command to install dependencies, e.g., pip install -e .]

fail_to_pass: [list of test commands or test case IDs that reproduce the bug and MUST pass after fix (Fix Success)]
pass_to_pass: [list of existing test commands or test case IDs that MUST continue to pass (Functionality Preservation/Regression)]
